TEXT.TITLE: METROPOLITAN FINANCIAL<MPC> TO ACQUIRE COMPANY
TEXT.BODY: Metropolitan Financial Corp said it signed an agreement to acquire the stock of closely held Rothschild Financial Corp, St. Paul, Minn. Details of the purchase were withheld. It said Rothschild in 1986 originated 500 mln dlrs of mortgage loans, and its loan servicing portfolio stands at 1.4 billion dlrs. Officials of both companies estimated their combined efforts could produce originations of 800 mln dlrs and a loan servicing portfolio "well over 2.0 billion dlrs by yearend." Reuter
